articles.title: Why Kenya’s non-Nato ally status is crucial for regional security - BBC.com
articles.description: Kenya is the first country in sub-Saharan Africa to enter the special military alliance with the US.
articles.content:
Beverly Ochieng,BBC Monitoring, Nairobi
As a non-Nato ally, Kenya will have privileged access to sophisticated military equipment and training from the US
Kenyas designation as a major non-North At… [+5273 chars]

articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: What to know about South Africa's May 29 elections - NPR
articles.description: Pollsters and analysts say these could be the most pivotal elections since the country's first democratic vote 30 years ago, in 1994. Here's what's at stake.
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG, South Africa Its autumn in South Africa, where election season is in full swing and the streets are plastered with campaign posters of smiling politicians promising A Job In Every Home … [+8513 chars]
